name: Streadata.io API Gallery - VersaPay
description: This is a repository of versapay APIs, self-contained as a Github repository, with HTML and YAML representations of the APIs and their surrounding operations.

apis.name: VersaPay
apis.description: VersaPay handles elements of both credit and debit card merchant payment processing in Canada. In offering a host of merchant account services and credit card POS terminals it allows for an efficient merchant payment service in all aspects- in person, on the go, online, and at the office. Founded in 2005 by Michael Gokturk, VersaPay is a Canadian owned and operated national financial transaction services provider partnered with Chase Paymentech. Versapay also offers electronic funds transfer through a system called Versapay EMT.
